definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Because myself must immigrate Hong Kong, decides the American Armor Shop sell.
sentences.chinese: 因本人要移民香港，決定把美甲店出售。

sentences.english: Manicure counters are a familiar sight in Singapore's ubiquitous shopping malls, which also boast at least one beauty salon each.
sentences.chinese: 美甲店和美容院在新加坡的各大商場中隨處可以看見。

sentences.english: Do you know where I could buy a tie?
sentences.chinese: 你能推薦一個好的美甲師嗎？

sentences.english: Do you need to specify the nail it? Or we help you arrange.
sentences.chinese: 請問您需求指定美甲師嗎？或者是本人們幫您佈置。

sentences.english: Is this the manicure of the future?
sentences.chinese: 這就是未來的美甲工具嗎？

sentences.english: Could you recommend a good manicurist?
sentences.chinese: 你能推薦一個好的美甲師嗎？

sentences.english: E-Manicure is smaller and lighter than others on the market.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型電子美甲儀不僅體積小，而且更加輕巧。

sentences.english: Okay, the manicurist will be right here.
Do you want to raise a high profit in your shop?
sentences.chinese: 您的美甲店希望獲得高額的利潤回報嗎？

sentences.english: I pointed to the dark red OPI bottle.
sentences.chinese: 美甲的時候，我指向一瓶暗紅色的OPI瓶子。

sentences.english: A group of Singaporean entrepreneurs recently launched E-Manicure.
sentences.chinese: 最近一羣新加坡企業家聯合推出這種電子美甲儀。

sentences.english: You have to go to a professional manicurist to make your nails look good.
sentences.chinese: 你必須去專業美甲師，使您的指甲好看。

sentences.english: She has only been into the shop two days this week.
sentences.chinese: 她這個星期只去過美甲店兩次。

definition: hairdressing/to give sb's hair a cut or other beauty treatment/beautiful hair
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
